title: help me please
body: {{champion:35}}   guys please help me i have  a really big problems in downloading the 16gb updates so if anyone can please upload it for me i will be thank full please guys i cant live with out the game

replies.body: That 16gb download can be a bit hefty if this is your first time trying to download League. While you might have success by trying a torrent, I wanted to point out that there are also a number of risks associated with torrenting as well. First and foremost, there's no way to be 100% sure that there aren't any malicious files attached to that torrent file. You're free to give torrenting a try, but keep in mind that you may need to do some virus scans to make sure your system is safe after the download. Becuase of this, it may be best to wait on the normal download.
